title: Crawley Greenway Walking and Cycle Route

description: The Crawley Greenway runs along leafy paths through the Sussex town of Crawley. The route is waymarked and includes views of the Stanford Brook and a visit to the lovely Tilgate Forest Park with its pretty lakes and woodland. Part of the route is also suitable for cyclists. The route links up with the Worth Way at the eastern end.
display_address: M23, Worth, Maidenbower, Crawley, West Sussex, England, RH10 7ZJ, United Kingdom
